name: One Life To Alice
description:
This game consists of two interconnected parts. The first part is a visual novel about a girl named Alice, living in the near future. The pleasant visual presentation and a story based on real events will not leave you indifferent. You will learn about the dangers of careless internet usage and what it can lead to.

The second part symbolizes Alice's inner experiences and is presented in a top-down shooter style. You will face various enemies and navigate through a complex maze to help the girl not only escape but also find herself.

Embark on this journey with Alice and find out how it all ends.

Features:
✦ Engaging and diverse gameplay.
✦ Memorable storyline based on real events.
✦ 6 Cyberpunk-style musical compositions.
✦ Multiple types of unique enemies.
